column1: Thoughtful Op-ed in Space News much appreciated https://t.co/CJq5g3NIEK
RT @SpaceX: If you have audio, photos or videos of our anomaly last week, please send to report@spacex.com. Material may be useful for inveâ€¦
@abadcliche Most likely true, but we can't yet find it on any vehicle sensors
Will get back to Autopilot update blog tomorrow.
@ashwin7002 @NASA @faa @AFPAA We have not ruled that out.
Particularly trying to understand the quieter bang sound a few seconds before the fireball goes off. May come from rocket or something else.
Support & advice from @NASA, @FAA, @AFPAA & others much appreciated. Please email any recordings of the event to report@spacex.com.
Important to note that this happened during a routine filling operation. Engines were not on and there was no apparent heat source.
Still working on the Falcon fireball investigation. Turning out to be the most difficult and complex failure we have ever had in 14 years.
@waitbutwhy It's been a little crazy lately
